scopecontent.p: The Counselor to the President Series consists of four boxes which cover the months from February to November, 1976. It contains correspondence, brochures, press releases, lists, clippings, speeches, and reports. One of Morton's main responsibilities was to solicit executive branch support for the Ford campaign as well as act as a White House liaison to the election committee. There are some letters in the files on the Ford campaign dated before Morton officially moved from the White House to the election committee, as well as many letters addressed to Howard (Bo) Callaway and Jim Baker, the campaign managers. The files are arranged alphabetically and in reverse chronological order within the folders.
